name: RUNNER (itch) (jefftastic)
description:
RUNNER is a cute retro game created by me (JM) and my friend. (TS)

Mr. Cap always wanted to be a star runner, and so his epic conquest began to be the greatest runner ever.

When you play this masterpiece, you will find:

  • Cool artwork!
  • Engaging gameplay!
  • Decent music (I really tried lol)
  • Informative dialogue!
  • CHONK MODE
  • A whole bunch of passion and love put in.
  • CHONK MODE

Go ahead and give the game a shot, there's a good chance you'll like it.

Programming, Technical Work, some Artwork, and Music done by JM.

Artwork, Designs and Concepts done by TS.
